name: Dust: Guardian of The Light Tree
name_original: Dust: Guardian of The Light Tree
description:
Explore Dust's beautiful small world and help him on his journey protecting it and saving it's light source from being affected by darkness.

Features:

  • An awesome soundtrack composed by Tom Peter.
  • An atmospheric small world to get lost in.

Keyboard controls:

  • W,S,A,D to move
  • Space to jump (you can also double jump)
  • Left mouse button to attack
  • R to restart
  • Escape to open the pause menu

Credits:

  • A Game by: Houcine Chelbi
  • Music by: Tom Peter

Made with Godot Engine.
